text: Hugo Beltrami is a Canadian natural scientist, currently a Canada Research Chair in Climate Dynamics at St. Francis Xavier University.He works as a professor in the Climate & Atmospheric Sciences Institute at St. Francis Xavier University ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:St. Francis Xavier University faculty Category:Canadian engineers Category:Université du Québec à Montréal alumni Category:Queen's University at Kingston alumni Category:University of Winnipeg alumni
title: Hugo Beltrami
